<<<<<<< HEAD
Virgo triumphans, or, Virginia in generall, but the south part therof in particular including the fertile Carolana, and the no lesse excellent island of Roanoak, richly and experimentally valued : humbly presented as the auspice of a beginning yeare, to the Parliament of England, and councell of state / by Edward Williams, Gent. Williams, Edward, fl. 1650. Ferrar, John, d. 1657.
[14], 47 p.
Printed by Thomas Harper, for John Stephenson, and are to be sold at his shop ..., London : 1650.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. The material for this work was communicated to Williams by John Farrer or Ferrar. cf. "To the reader."
=======
